name: Rise Art
tag_list: art, online, e-commerce, rentals, rent, social-commerce, crowd-sourcing, social, community, tate, serpentine-gallery, parasol-unit
overview:
Rise Art makes owning art a fun and easy for the masses. Discover original art you love from top artists, museums and galleries worldwide by taking the Rise Art Style Quiz. Based on your results, our curators will put together a collection of work based on your unique taste.

When you find something you love, rent it, and live with the art in your home before you commit to buying. We’ll send the work to you framed and ready-to-hang. Rent for as long as you like, or purchase the work, using credits earned from your rental. Otherwise, return it free of charge at anytime.

Take the quiz and get started at www.riseart.com/quiz

funding_rounds.source_description: RiseArt introduces the fine arts world and social media with its new e-commerce website
